overview:
Adam is currently Project Manager at Gnip. He recently served as Director, Product Management at OneRiot until its acquisition by Walmart. OneRiot was a mobile ad network and data provider that leveraged its proprietary Social Targeting Service to apply demographic, geographic and interest category targeting to mobile ad inventory. Until its acquisition, OneRiot was the first and only company to offer these valuable targeting dimensions for mobile inventory.

Prior to joining OneRiot, Adam was a web development engineer on the small, entrepreneurial team that conceptualized, created and launched Compete.com, now part of the WPP Group [Nasdaq: WPP]. Adam played a major role in the design and development of Compete.com, including much of the core functionality, that still remains today. He has founded and been involved with a number of additional startups as well.

Adam holds a MBA from Fisher College of Business at The Ohio State University with a concentration in Marketing, Strategy and Entrepreneurship. He also holds a B.S. in Computer Graphics Technology from Purdue University with minors in Organizational Leadership & Supervision and Computer & Information Technology.
